content.rendered:
Directed by Jessica M. Thompson

Written by Blair Butler

Star Nathalie Emmanuel(Evie). Thomas Doherty(De Ville). Sean Pertwee(Renfield). Hugh Skinner(Oliver). Carol Ann Crawford(Mrs. Swift). Alana Boden(Lucy). Stephanie Corneliussen(Viktoria). Tian Chaudhry(Diya (Maid #5)). Courtney Taylor(Grace). Scott Alexander Young(Uncle Julius). Ian Lindsay(Great Uncle Alfred). Lili Walters(Imogen (Maid #2)). Elizabeth Counsell(Mina Harker). Virág Bárány(Emmaline). Jeremy Wheeler(Jonathan Harker). Viktoria Monhor(Maid #1 (as Viktória Monhor)). Celina-Betty Diana Schleicher(Maid #3). Murányi Panka(Maid #4 (as Anna Liza Murányi)). Simon Szabó(Dark Priest). Peter Linka(CEO (as Péter Linka)). Stephen Saracco(Older Man). Gábor Matus(Boss (Tony)). Kata Sarbó(Manicurist (as Kata Sarbo)). András Korcsmáros(Groundskeeper). Norbert Saray(Sailor). Attila Ferencz(Sailor (as Attila Pál Ferencz)). Gergely Boronyak(Sailor (as Gergely Boronyák)). Christine Grace Szarko(Cheerful Woman (as Christine Mary Szarko))

Language English

Producers Michael P. Flannigan. Emile Gladstone. Jessica M. Thompson

Production Screen Gems. Mid Atlantic Films
